=10.2- Title of Explorator of Arsinoé=


<p>*Quest* :<em>Title of Explorator of Arsinoé</em> (Optional)</p>
<p>*Prerequisites* : Have acces to all places in Arsinoé.</p>

http://aerie-pinkpanther.googlecode.com/svn/Dragormina/Guide/images/lunedo10.png

==<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Context</span></p>==

You can prove your bravery by mapping Arsinoe. To do this you must contact De Martonne in Arsinoe and return to him a score card.
